mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (board_title, board_content, member_number) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select board_number, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_read_count, m.member_number, member_id from tbl_member m join tbl_board b on board_number = #{boardNumber} and m.member_number = b.member_number
